lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!throw You must name an item to equip.
!throw You do not have any {item} to equip.
!if {!is {me} equip_{slot}} = True and {!has item {!tag {me} equip_{slot}} {v}} = True
!say Successfully equipped the {item} to your {slot} slot.
